text: this is stephen Farrell for the New York
Times it's mid-morning at the LaGuardia
Airport Marriott and the lobby is full
of stranded travelers and New Yorkers
who came here to ride out the storm we
both are here because we have no
electricity and the storm has done
tremendous damage we have a flood in our
house and but we can't fix it because we
have no electricity and everyone we know
has no electricity so we're grateful to
be somewhere with his full generators
the plan was that tomorrow we have a
flight to Miami because our flight back
to Moscow is from Miami but now since
the airport is closed and we have no
information may be one of the solutions
would be that we rent the car and go
there by car we got here on Sunday
morning and we're trying to get home to
Phoenix so I got a three-year-old that's
ready to go trick-or-treating so I'm
hoping I make it in time but for now
there is still no official word on when
LaGuardia Airport will open
